text: Bay Area leaders decry Trump administration’s attack on Venezuela - San Francisco Chronicle

text: Iran's leader says rioters 'must be put in their place' as protest death toll rises to at least 10 - PBS

text: What Happens To Your TV When You Leave It On All The Time - bgr.com
